bio.title: Who am I ?
content: Young web developer passionate about innovative technologies, creating meaningful applications, and tackling technical challenges.
Strong experience in web development with PHP, Symfony, React, HTML/CSS/JS, and more.
Proactive approach to solving technical challenges by leveraging my knowledge and collaborating with the team.
Motivated to quickly learn new technologies and integrate them into my projects.
Passionate about tennis, mountain hiking, and video games, which help me developping a winning mentality and keeping in good shape.
Currently in an apprenticeship, I aim to continue developing my skills while working on stimulating and innovative projects.
Confident in my ability to make a significant contribution to a company that values teamwork, creativity, and innovation.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.projectOneDescription: Fake Spotify is a React application aiming to replicate the functionality of the popular music streaming application.
projects.projectTwoDescription: Stravabien is a React Native application that utilizes the Strava API and adds additional features.
projects.projectThreeDescription: Front-end website fetching SWAPI (Star Wars API) in JS with HTML/CSS for the display and style.

timeline.title: My career path
timeline.item3: Bachelor's Degree in English-Spanish Applied Languages, University of Bordeaux Montaigne (Sep 2019-Dec 2020)
timeline.item4: Baccalaureate in Social Sciences, Sud MÃ©doc Highschool (July 2019)
